summary: The City of Everweyr.  ---WORK IN PROGRESS---
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i20.photobucket.com/albums/b209/darkwriter/Skyrim%20Creation%20Kit/Everweyr-Hall_zps75d5d027.jpg[/img][/center]

Introduction

The City of Everweyr is based on a mod I created for the Steam Workshop which was a large house called "Everweyr" that you could access in any of the major cities of Skyrim as well as High Hrothgar. I decided to take that concept and make Everweyr an entire city that exists in another dimension. Now, instead of a small room with several doors, you can get to the various cities and even the smaller villages (such as Rorikstead) via the "Hall of Doors".

Finding Everweyr

If you want a challenge there is a note on the workbench outside of Warmaiden's in Whiterun with a small riddle on it. However if you wish to use the more direct approach uses the COC command and head for 001EverHall

Requirements:

Skyrim 1.9 +
All Official DLC

Important Information

This is a work in progress, and not yet near completion at any rate. If I was to put a percentage on it I would estimate I have about ten percent done. A few of the buildings can be entered but most cannot and I have not navmeshed most of it so any companions will not be able to enter the city with you (tho they can join you in the Hall of Doors)

Eventually I hope to furnish all the buildings and add various NPCs and quests tho with the size it is and the amount I want to do with it I may require help.


UPDATE:

Added a few more locations to explore as well as an Inn Keeper and a Bard

In order to use the newly created "Hall of Doors -Solstheim" you will need to find the key in Solstheim which is somewhere in Raven Rock Docks and you will again need a seperate Key to unlock the fast door to Miraak's Temple.
